name: Modern
tagline: Javascript library for modern browsers that only care about what we need and we made it as simple as possible.mostly prototype extended.
body:
### Welcome Modern JS
Using Modern:
```
Document ready:
document.ready(callback)

Selector
M(selector)  //return NodeList or HTMLElement

Event Listener
M(selector).on(eventName,callback,{context})
or
HTMLElement.on or NodeList.on

M(selector).off(eventName,callback,{context})
or
HTMLElement.off or NodeList.off

M(selector).forEach(callback)
or NodeList.forEach

form.serialize()  //for x-www-form-urlencoded  form submit
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
